message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  It's something that I know you've been looking for and I'm confident it will meet your needs.  I'm offering it to you for $1,450,000. This price represents a significant value to you, considering what this product is worth. I understand you have other options, but I believe this is the best deal you'll find. Let me know what you think!
